name: Zen and the art of fishing
name_original: Zen and the art of fishing
description:
Chill on your boat, take in the scenery and catch the odd fish or two

When in doubt, throw it in the water.

Accuracy multiplies your score.

Features:

6 non-violent fishing tools with 4 upgrades for each

3 types of friendly fish to meet

1 boat

Maximum Zen

This was originally a simple demo for a VR course but I kept adding to it when I found people actually enjoyed playing it, as such it is in a very early stage and every little bit of feedback will help make it better.

If you have any suggestions please let me know, i got all the free time in the world and zero new ideas so don't be surprised if your suggestion gets added the very next day.
